patterns: I want to hear a joke
Lighten the mood with a joke
Can you tell me a funny story?
Give me something to smile about
Share a funny joke with me
responses: Why do not scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
I told my computer I needed a break, and now it will not stop sending me to a page that says Error 404: Not Found!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
I asked the librarian if the library had any books on paranoia. She whispered, They are right behind you!
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
Why do not skeletons fight each other? They do not have the guts!
I would tell you a joke about an elevator, but it is an uplifting experience!
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems!
What did one wall say to the other wall? I will meet you at the corner!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised!
Why was the computer cold? Because it left its Windows open!
Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut? He just needed a little space!
Why can not you give Elsa a balloon? Because she will let it go!
I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands!
Why did the coffee file a police report? It got mugged!
I would tell you a chemistry joke, but I know I would not get a reaction!
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants? In case he got a hole in one!
Why do not oysters share their pearls? Because they are shellfish!
What do you call cheese that is not yours? Nacho cheese!
I told my dog to play dead, and now he is just lying around!
